sys_transform_map.name: u_imp_saml_user_05o6wwiogg

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_map_3f60195d97e7a1106afa3ab71153af61
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>u_imp_saml_user_05o6wwiogg</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[//This is important for the first ever login, otherwise an empty user may be created
//until a Field Map is defined below - It's recommended to use the same field for coalescing
//as defined in SSO user_field or nameid attribute field
if(action == "insert") {
    //if no coalesce is set, then ignore insert
    if(!coalesceIsSet()) {
        ignore = true;
        gs.log("No coalesce is set, insert is ignored!");
    } 
}

//Returns true is coalesce field has been set for this
//transform map, false otherwise
function coalesceIsSet() {
    var fieldMap = new GlideRecord("sys_transform_entry");
    fieldMap.addQuery("map.name", "u_imp_saml_user_05o6wwiogg");
    fieldMap.addQuery("coalesce", true);
    fieldMap.query();
    return fieldMap.hasNext();
}
]]></script><source_table>u_imp_saml_user_05o6wwiogg</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sascha.wawerzinek@isdfeniqs.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-19 14:48:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>3f60195d97e7a1106afa3ab71153af61</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_imp_saml_user_05o6wwiogg</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LSS Core" source="x_isdfe_lss_core">900038c497a329106afa3ab71153af84</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LSS Core">900038c497a329106afa3ab71153af84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_3f60195d97e7a1106afa3ab71153af61</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sascha.wawerzinek@isdfeniqs.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-19 14:48:58</sys_updated_on><target_table>sys_user</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
